[`NullValue`](NullValue)

## NullValue class

[Value](Value) which represents null. NullValue is a singleton and `NullValue.value` should be used instead of calling the constructor.

 1.10.0

**Signature:**

```typescript
export class NullValue extends Value 
```
**Extends:** [`Value`](Value)
